name: cmsMinds
tagline: Web Development Company in Raleigh, NC
description:
cmsMinds is the leading web design and development company based in Raleigh, NC. Our expertise lies in CMS, (Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla), E-commerce (WooCommerce, Shopify, Magento) and custom (PHP, MEAN stack, NodeJS, Angular, React) web development. 
 
Projects:
Simple Brochure sites (5-20 pages). Theme-based and custom design
Enterprise sites (100k+ pages, 10K+ users, heavy content driven)
E-commerce (small e-commerce to enterprise e-commerce with custom development)
Speed optimization and Responsive web design
Migration from legacy or one cms to other (Wordpress to Drupal or vice versa)
Upgrade to newer version (Drupal upgrade from D6/D7 to D8). 
White label development for other agency clients
QA - functional, automated and manual testing
Work with product based clients to assist in product development
 
Differentiator:
Take ownership
Deadline driven, Stay in budget
Process driven
Add value to the project
